<code latex>
\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage{pgf,tikz}
\usepackage{mathrsfs}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\definecolor{ffffff}{rgb}{1.,1.,1.}
\definecolor{qqqqff}{rgb}{0.,0.,1.}
\definecolor{ffqqqq}{rgb}{1.,0.,0.}
\begin{tikzpicture}[line cap=round,line join=round,>=triangle 45,x=1.0cm,y=1.0cm]
\clip(-4.289721882508649,-4.974896261266048) rectangle (12.060475187607567,6.3663985930985145);
\fill[color=ffqqqq] (2.751940473786517,5.805130612242991) -- (0.755698863511798,2.343499483414452) -- (4.755698863511798,2.343499483414452) -- cycle;
\fill[color=ffffff,fill=ffffff,fill opacity=1.0] (2.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403) -- (5.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403) -- (5.125768132111823,-2.4273658469044026) -- (2.125768132111823,-2.4273658469044026) -- cycle;
\fill[color=ffffff,fill=ffffff,fill opacity=1.0] (4.437293507086871,-7.638509549645783) -- (7.437293507086867,-7.638509549645783) -- (7.437293507086867,-5.638509549645783) -- (4.437293507086871,-5.638509549645783) -- cycle;
\draw (0.0879772084938242,6.162784681889097) node[anchor=north west] {$A)$};
\draw [line width=3.2pt,,color=ffqqqq] (2.751940473786517,5.805130612242991)-- (0.755698863511798,2.343499483414452);
\draw [line width=2.8pt,color=qqqqff] (0.755698863511798,2.343499483414452)-- (4.755698863511798,2.343499483414452);
\draw [line width=2.pt,color=qqqqff] (4.755698863511798,2.343499483414452)-- (2.751940473786517,5.805130612242991);
\draw [color=ffffff] (2.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403)-- (5.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403);
\draw [color=ffffff] (5.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403)-- (5.125768132111823,-2.4273658469044026);
\draw [color=ffffff] (2.125768132111823,-2.4273658469044026)-- (2.125768132111823,-4.427365846904403);
\draw [color=ffffff] (4.437293507086871,-7.638509549645783)-- (7.437293507086867,-7.638509549645783);

\draw [color=ffffff] (4.437293507086871,-5.638509549645783)-- (4.437293507086871,-7.638509549645783);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
</code>
